ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: The Joes in Olliestan discover Cobra, the Blue Ninjas and Red Shadows are all working together to develop a massive robotic weapon. At the Pit, Serpentor is tested in combat against three remote-controlled Joe tanks and destroys them using the firepower of Project Mongoose's giant robot. In Japan, Storm Shadow, Raymond and Granny Demon destroy a Blue Ninja operation.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-11 06:14:31. [CVDB482711] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 10:20:22. [Issue ID 1331144]
